HERO_SINOPSIS: I craft elegant solutions to complex problems with clean, maintainable code and thoughtful user experiences.
EXPERIENCE_SINOPSIS: A big experience building software solutions and digital experiences
HAVE_PROJECT_IN_MIND: Have a project in mind or want to discuss an opportunity? I'd love to hear from you.
NAME: Name
OPEN_TO_DISCUSS: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities.
GET_BACK_TO_YOU: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
SELECTION_OF_WORK: A selection of my recent work and personal projects
AJUDADANA_DESCRIPTION: A collaborative web server built to help the people affected by the floods of Valencia in October 2024, it was implemented in two weeks due to the urgency of the app to be active as soon as possible.
RCORE_DESCRIPTION: A cross-platform framework featuring dependency injection and a multi-threaded service architecture. Includes base services such as a generic server, HTTP server, and window management.
ARQ_WEBSITE_DESCRIPTION: An active web server for an architecture company. It showcases a wide range of projects, from single-family homes to large-scale urban developments.
PORTFOLIO_WEB_DESCRIPTION: An active web server showcasing various projects and professional experiences. It provides an overview of each project, highlighting technologies used and linking to active servers.
AI_SELF_DRIVING_DESCRIPTION: A collaborative project with a team of 10 aimed at creating a self-driving car. The implementation included three distinct AI models working together to ensure safe and optimized driving.
EMBEDDED_SENSORING_DESCRIPTION: A team project with four members to design a long-lasting, internet-connected sensing device. Utilized low-energy Wi-Fi protocols, specialized hardware, and an energy-efficient operating system.
APP_NOTAS_DESCRIPTION: A mobile application for taking notes, featuring a text editor with image upload support and a basic music player. Built using Xamarin to explore mobile app development.
PANGA_DESCRIPTION: Developed during a 12-hour game jam with a team of three, this Unity project focuses on implementing the mathematical physics behind the classic Panga game.
ABOUT_ME_SUMMARY: I am a passionate and versatile software engineer with a strong academic foundation and diverse professional experience. My journey began with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, during which I had the opportunity to study in both my home country and abroad through the ERASMUS program. This cross-cultural academic experience honed my technical skills and adaptability. Concurrently, I started my professional career through internships and student roles, gradually advancing to more complex and responsible positions. Over the years, I have developed expertise across various technologies and environments, ranging from on-premise server management to modern cloud infrastructure, backend and frontend development, and collaborative agile workflows. My ability to adapt to new challenges and deliver impactful solutions has been a consistent hallmark of my career.
EXPERIENCE_DESCRIPTION: I began working during the third year of my Bachelor’s degree, starting with internship roles that gradually gave me more responsibility. Over time, I have evolved into a versatile developer capable of working with various tech stacks and in diverse contexts.
STUDIES_DESCRIPTION: After completing my high school education in my hometown, I decided to pursue a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at a university in my city. Over four years, I gained foundational knowledge in programming, hardware, and project management. In my final year, I participated in the ERASMUS program, studying at the University of Antwerp. This experience allowed me to immerse myself in a different culture and language while adapting to the Belgian academic and work environment.

Role: Student Developer (1 year) → Full-Time Developer
At FlowTribe, I contributed to various projects, ranging from creating new features to debugging existing systems.
